item.title: Uncle Ramesh's Take â€” 'Dem Cyaan See Progress If Yuh Put Blindfold Pon Dem Eye'
item.description: Uncle Ramesh reads the Chronicle cover to cover, watches the budget debate livestream from Queens, and can’t believe the opposition opened with a gold-smuggling MP demanding mining transparency.
